originalText.text: Chung is great, super friendly and did an excellent quality hem for my bridesmaid dress! Fair pricing. Happy to find a new alteration place in the city!

text.text: Chung is great, super friendly and did an excellent quality hem for my bridesmaid dress! Fair pricing. Happy to find a new alteration place in the city!

originalText.text: Went off a friend’s recommendation to have my dress altered. It was a first time experience, and Chung was super welcoming. The service was better than expected, and I can’t wait to go back again with even more clothes. Would recommend to anyone who has to service dresses or any article of clothing!

text.text: Went off a friend’s recommendation to have my dress altered. It was a first time experience, and Chung was super welcoming. The service was better than expected, and I can’t wait to go back again with even more clothes. Would recommend to anyone who has to service dresses or any article of clothing!

originalText.text: Excellent service and great turnaround time. Their services are very worth while and reasonable. The whole time it was very welcoming, and would recommend to anyone who has to do bulk alterations or even for just a couple clothes.

text.text: Excellent service and great turnaround time. Their services are very worth while and reasonable. The whole time it was very welcoming, and would recommend to anyone who has to do bulk alterations or even for just a couple clothes.

originalText.text: Chung alteration was great! Had an amazing time and the service for my pants were exactly what I envisioned. They are a bit of a hidden gem in West Village, but well worth the trip.

text.text: Chung alteration was great! Had an amazing time and the service for my pants were exactly what I envisioned. They are a bit of a hidden gem in West Village, but well worth the trip.

originalText.text: As a petite woman I have had to get many of my clothes altered. I was usually left feeling like the outcome was not as stylish or as flattering as I had hoped. Then I found the amazing guys at Alternate Concept! I have been a customer for over five years and would never go anywhere else! They instantly know what a garment needs to look flattering on your body and they are well versed in what is current. Furthermore they have always gone above and beyond for me when I bring in a piece that will need a lot of work. I can honestly say they have never once disappointed me. I think that’s really rare and can’t think of many other services I can say that about. I noticed a few reviews about “the guy who answers the phone”. While I have never had a bad interact with him, I can see how he might come across as straightforward. I say don’t let that turn you off from them. Give them a shot and let their great work and customer service win you over.
